title: Watch This FIRST Before Detailing Your Car -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: Meet /DRIVE CLEAN host Larry Kosilla and find out what you should NEVER do when detailing your car, and how Larry went from disgruntled commodities trader to the foremost car-care specialist in the US.
tags: how to detail a car, cleaning, polishing, vehicle detailing
